name: Mitigation Playbook for PowerShell Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed PowerShell scripts for persistent access, compromising sensitive data.

action--c3c408f0-f4e0-4f02-bdcd-8bc82f4e.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--c3c408f0-f4e0-4f02-bdcd-8bc82f4e.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes used for malicious actions.

if-condition--6d243c3e-1826-4738-9684-5b.name: Check if any malicious process found

action--de6b05c8-f686-4e31-b1f2-ab9a6124.name: Disconnect from malicious network
action--de6b05c8-f686-4e31-b1f2-ab9a6124.description: Bring down the network interface to prevent further communication.

action--f8f49c59-f456-43f7-b40e-50a8a2ba.name: Scan host for additional threats
action--f8f49c59-f456-43f7-b40e-50a8a2ba.description: Perform a comprehensive scan of the host for additional threats and malware.
